00051 /**
00052  *              \brief  Display current information about cheking buffers
00053  *
00054  *              Function display information if 0==m_CountOfCycle
00055  *              function is called from main with interval of 100 ms
00056  */
00057 void    TF_TestCnt::StepTable( void )
00058 {
00059 
00060 
00061         if( 0!=m_CountOfCycle )
00062                 return;
00063 
00064         unsigned blockRd=0;
00065         unsigned blockOk=0;
00066         unsigned blockError=0;
00067 
00068         for( int ii=0; ii<3; ii++ )
00069         {
00070                 blockRd+=td->ptrMonitor->block[ii].blockRd;
00071                 blockOk+=td->ptrMonitor->block[ii].blockOk;
00072                 blockError+=td->ptrMonitor->block[ii].blockError;
00073 
00074         }
00075 
00076         printf( "  %10d  %10d   %10d \r", blockRd, blockOk, blockError );
00077 }

00079 /**
00080  *              \brief  Prepare CUDA and buffers
00081  *
00082  *              Open CUDA device
00083  *              Allocate three buffers and buffer for monitor
00084  */
00085 void TF_TestCnt::PrepareInThread( void )
00086 {
00087 
00088         m_pCuda = new CL_Cuda( m_argc, m_argv );
00089 
00090         td->monitor.id=100;
00091 
00092 
00093         td->countOfBuffers=3;
00094         int size=m_SizeBufferOfKb;
00095         td->sizeBufferOfBytes=size*1024;
00096 
00097 
00098         for( int ii=0; ii<td->countOfBuffers ; ii++ )
00099         {
00100                 td->bar1[ii].id=ii;
00101                 m_pCuda->AllocateBar1Buffer( size, &(td->bar1[ii]) );
00102         }
00103         m_pCuda->AllocateBar1Buffer( 256, &(td->monitor) );
00104 
00105 
00106         td->ptrMonitor=(TaskMonitor*)td->monitor.app_addr[0];
00107 
00108         for( int ii=0; ii<td->countOfBuffers; ii++ )
00109         {
00110                 td->ptrMonitor->block[ii].ptrCudaIn=(void*)(td->bar1[ii].cuda_addr);
00111 
00112                 td->ptrMonitor->block[ii].sizeOfKBytes=size;
00113 
00114                 td->ptrMonitor->block[ii].irqFlag=0;
00115                 td->ptrMonitor->block[ii].blockOk=0;
00116                 td->ptrMonitor->block[ii].blockError=0;
00117                 td->ptrMonitor->block[ii].blockRd=0;
00118                 for( int jj=0; jj<TaskCounts; jj++ )
00119                 {
00120                  td->ptrMonitor->block[ii].check[jj].cntError=0;
00121                  td->ptrMonitor->block[ii].check[jj].flagError=0;
00122                 }
00123         }
00124 
00125         td->ptrMonitor->flagExit=0;
00126         td->ptrMonitor->sig=0xAA24;
00127 
00128 
00129         printf( "m_CountOfCycle=%d\n", m_CountOfCycle );
00130         printf( "m_SizeBufferOfKb=%d [kB]\n\n", m_SizeBufferOfKb );
00131 
00132         if( 0==m_CountOfCycle )
00133                 printf( "\n    BLOCK_RD    BLOCK_OK     BLOCK_ERROR \n" );
00134 
00135 }

00137 /**
00138  *              \brief          Free buffers and close device
00139  *
00140  */
00141 void TF_TestCnt::CleanupInThread( void )
00142 {
00143 
00144         for( int ii=0; ii<td->countOfBuffers; ii++ )
00145         {
00146                 m_pCuda->FreeBar1Buffer( &(td->bar1[ii]) );
00147         }
00148         m_pCuda->FreeBar1Buffer( &(td->monitor) );
00149 
00150         delete m_pCuda; m_pCuda=NULL;
00151 
00152         fprintf( stderr, "%s - Ok\n", __FUNCTION__ );
00153 }

00155 /**
00156  *      \brief  fill buffer
00157  *
00158  *      \param  pBar1   description of buffer
00159  *
00160  *      function fill bar1 buffer via pBar1->app_addr[]
00161  *
00162  */
00163 void TF_TestCnt::FillCounter( CL_Cuda::BAR1_BUF *pBar1 )
00164 {
00165         if( 0xA05 != pBar1->state )
00166                 throw(0);
00167 
00168         int size64=pBar1->page_size/8;
00169         uint64_t *dst;
00170         uint64_t val=td->currentCounter;
00171 
00172         for( int page=0; page<pBar1->page_count; page++ )
00173         {
00174                 dst=(uint64_t*) (pBar1->app_addr[page]);
00175                 for( int ii=size64; ii; ii--)
00176                         *dst++=val++;
00177 
00178         }
00179         td->currentCounter=val;
00180 }

00186 /**
00187  *      \brief  Main working cycle
00188  *
00189  *      It is main working cycle.
00190  *      Function FillCounter  simulate to work external DMA channel.
00191  *
00192  */
00193 void TF_TestCnt::Run( void )
00194 {
00195 
00196         size_t size=256*1024;
00197 
00198 
00199         long *ptrCudaMonitor=(long*)(td->monitor.cuda_addr);
00200 
00201         cudaStream_t    streamBuf0;
00202         cudaStream_t    streamBuf1;
00203         cudaStream_t    streamBuf2;
00204 
00205         cudaStreamCreate( &streamBuf0 );
00206         cudaStreamCreate( &streamBuf1 );
00207         cudaStreamCreate( &streamBuf2 );
00208 
00209 
00210         run_checkCounter(  ptrCudaMonitor, 0, streamBuf0 );
00211         run_checkCounter(  ptrCudaMonitor, 1, streamBuf1 );
00212         run_checkCounter(  ptrCudaMonitor, 2, streamBuf2 );
00213 
00214 
00215         int val;
00216 
00217         for( int kk=0; ; kk++ )
00218         {
00219 
00220 
00221                 if( m_isTerminate || (m_CountOfCycle>0 && m_CountOfCycle==kk ))
00222                 {
00223                         td->ptrMonitor->flagExit=1;
00224                         break;
00225                 }
00226 
00227 //              Check for checkCounter finished checking buffer 0
00228 //              for( ; ; )
00229 //              {
00230 //                val = td->ptrMonitor->block[0].irqFlag;
00231 //                if( 0==val )
00232 //                        break;
00233 //              }
00234                 FillCounter( &td->bar1[0]);
00235                 td->ptrMonitor->block[0].irqFlag=1;
00236 
00237                 usleep( 100 );
00238 
00239 //              Check for checkCounter finished checking buffer 1
00240 //              for( ; ; )
00241 //              {
00242 //                val = td->ptrMonitor->block[1].irqFlag;
00243 //                if( 0==val )
00244 //                        break;
00245 //              }
00246                 FillCounter( &td->bar1[1]);
00247                 td->ptrMonitor->block[1].irqFlag=1;
00248 
00249                 usleep( 100 );
00250 
00251 //              Check for checkCounter finished checking buffer 2
00252 //              for( ; ; )
00253 //              {
00254 //                val = td->ptrMonitor->block[2].irqFlag;
00255 //                if( 0==val )
00256 //                        break;
00257 //              }
00258                 FillCounter( &td->bar1[2]);
00259                 td->ptrMonitor->block[2].irqFlag=1;
00260 
00261                 usleep( 100 );
00262 
00263         }
00264 
00265         for( volatile int jj=0; jj<100000000; jj++);
00266 
00267         td->ptrMonitor->flagExit=1;
00268 
00269 
00270         cudaStreamSynchronize( streamBuf0 );
00271         cudaStreamSynchronize( streamBuf1 );
00272         cudaStreamSynchronize( streamBuf2 );
00273 
00274 
00275         GetResult();
00276 
00277         return;
00278

00281 }

00295 /**
00296  *              \brief  Display result for one buffers
00297  *
00298  *              \param  nbuf    number of buffer
00299  *
00300  */
00301 void TF_TestCnt::GetResultBuffer( int nbuf )
00302 {
00303 
00304         TaskBufferStatus *ts=&(td->ptrMonitor->block[nbuf]);
00305         printf( "\nBuffer %d\n", nbuf );
00306         printf( "block_rd=%d\n", ts->blockRd );
00307         printf( "block_ok=%d\n", ts->blockOk );
00308         printf( "block_error=%d\n", ts->blockError );
00309 
00310         int flag_ok=1;
00311         for( int ii=0; ii<TaskCounts;ii++)
00312         {
00313                 if( 0!=ts->check[ii].cntError )
00314                 {
00315                         flag_ok=0;
00316                         break;
00317                 }
00318         }
00319 
00320         if( 1==flag_ok )
00321         {
00322                 printf( "Task 0:%d  - Ok\n",  TaskCounts-1 );
00323 
00324         } else
00325         {
00326 
00327 
00328                 for( int ii=0; ii<TaskCounts; ii++ )
00329                 {
00330                         unsigned int cntError=ts->check[ii].cntError;
00331                         if( 0==cntError )
00332                         {
00333                                 printf( "Task %d -Ok\n", ii );
00334                         } else
00335                         {
00336                                 printf( "\nTask %d \n", ii );
00337                                 printf( "   cntError=%d\n", cntError);
00338                                 if( cntError>16 )
00339                                         cntError=16;
00340                                 for( int jj=0; jj<cntError; jj++ )
00341                                 {
00342                                  printf( "%2d block: %4d  addr: 0x%.4X  receive: 0x%.8lX  expect: 0x%.8lX\n",
00343                                                  jj,
00344                                                  ts->check[ii].nblock[jj],
00345                                                  ts->check[ii].adr[jj],
00346                                                  ts->check[ii].receive_data[jj],
00347                                                  ts->check[ii].expect_data[jj]
00348                                          );
00349                                 }
00350                         }
00351 
00352                 }
00353         }
00354 
00355 
00356 
00357 }
